# Square Root of 2

> [Square root][@stdlib/math/base/special/sqrt] of `2`.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var SQRT2 = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-sqrt-two' );
```

#### SQRT2

[Square root][@stdlib/math/base/special/sqrt] of `2`.

```javascript
var bool = ( SQRT2 === 1.4142135623730951 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var SQRT2 = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-sqrt-two' );

console.log( SQRT2 );
// => 1.4142135623730951
```

</section>
